Name: Lee: Palefire
BtnContent: I got it, Lee.
Contents[1]: I found this flower during one of the missions. After looking up the database, I realized it was from the same family as the one you gave me.
Contents[2]: Seeing this flower...made me think of someone. Such coincidence was an extremely rare event, statistically.
Contents[3]: To me, it was of significant value for research... I preserved it, so I could give it to the person it led me to.
Contents[4]: According to the data from Golden Age, flowers had a language of their own. So...here's my reply to you.

Name: Lucia: Lotus
BtnContent: Let's talk about something you enjoy.
Contents[1]: Commandant, everybody told me to come here because I got a gift from you. What did they mean?
Contents[2]: Are you trying to tell me something? Sorry I can't hear you, you're stuttering quite a bit.
Contents[3]: Just say it. I'll remember everything you say. Anything.

Name: Liv: Eclipse
BtnContent: No problem. I'm glad you like it.
Contents[1]: Commandant, I planted this rose myself...
Contents[2]: Sorry that I never told you about this. I just wanted to give you a surprise today...
Contents[3]: But I never thought that Commandant would be the first to give me a flower.

Name: Bianca: Zero
BtnContent: It feels great to understand you.
Contents[1]: Commandant, as a leader, you should manage your work-life balance.
Contents[2]: Seeing your white rose reminded me of what other team members said about this date.
Contents[3]: The date was only a homophone... Still, everyone wanted to spend that day with their Mr. or Mrs. Right...
Contents[4]: So I wrote these numbers on the gift box in the hope that this flower could bring you my sincere prayers and wishes.

Name: Nanami: Storm
BtnContent: Thanks... Let me put on my goggles first.
Contents[1]: Oooh? FOR ME?
Contents[2]: Nanami's so glad! I wish Commandant can be as happy as Nanami!
Contents[3]: Let Nanami see... Ahah, there it is!
Contents[4]: Ta-da! Take it, Commandant! It's one of Nanami's best stuff!

Name: Kamui: Bastion
BtnContent: I will not forget.
Contents[1]: Commandant, you copy? This is Kamui from an encrypted private channel. Make sure you listen to this! *Beep—*
Contents[2]: Hey, Commandant, you busy? It's been a while since we last spoke!
Contents[3]: Today is the day of love! You sent me flowers, didn't you? I'm the only one to receive your gift of love, right?
Contents[4]: I'm so happy! Commandant, I've got something for you too! See, I went to the park and picked the most beautiful rose there!
Contents[5]: Sure. Will you come to me on this day every year? It's a deal then! I'll always be waiting for you!

Name: Karenina: Blast
BtnContent: Yeah, I'm free.
Contents[1]: I knew you would be writing those reports in the office. Hey, you don't have anything on, do you?
Contents[2]: Good...
Contents[3]: Why are you sitting on my sofa all of a sudden?
Contents[4]: I sit where I want to sit!
Contents[5]: By the way... You're free tonight, aren't you? I'll assume you are if you don't reply!

Name: Watanabe: Nightblade
BtnContent: It's a promise then.
Contents[1]: Morning, Commandant. How's work? I just...got your gift.
Contents[2]: Such a gift on such a day... Are you trying to tell me something?
Contents[3]: Anyway, I can feel your passion... Just remember to check your mailbox later.
Contents[4]: If you like it, I'll take you to the sea of flowers the next time you come to Oasis.

Name: Lucia: Dawn
BtnContent: I'll try to become the best Commandant too.
Contents[1]: Commandant, here's my gift for you in return. I'm not very good at this, so please forgive me if you don't like it...
Contents[2]: But I will keep trying... To become your weapon that can cut through all the obstacles, and...to become the best Construct in your mind.

Name: Liv: Lux
BtnContent: I'll be with you.
Contents[1]: Commandant, you don't have to do this.
Contents[2]: I love the flowers, but what I really want is...
Contents[3]: To have you by my side.

Name: Lee: Entropy
BtnContent: I like it a lot, thanks.
Contents[1]: I found this rose in some ruins during a mission long ago.
Contents[2]: It was so beautiful. According to the database, on certain important dates, people in the Golden Age would give such flowers...to their important ones.
Contents[3]: I recorded all its data, including the angle of every single petal, in my M.I.N.D. so I could restore it. It is the only rose I have stored in my M.I.N.D... And I hope you can see it too.

Name: Liv: Luminance
BtnContent: Alright.
Contents[1]: Commandant, thanks for your rose. I love it.
Contents[2]: Actually... I have a little surprise for you too.
Contents[3]: Can you come to the deck of Babylonia later?

Name: Kamui: Tenebrion
BtnContent: I'll take good care of this.
Contents[1]: Hey, Commandant, you busy? Mind if I spare some of your time?
Contents[2]: I got your gift, so I was wondering if I should do something to return your favor. How about I give myself to you... Joking! Hehe.
Contents[3]: Anyway, I've got a little surprise for you! Don't tell anyone else!
Contents[4]: Make sure you take good care of it! I want to stay with Commandant forever just like this gift.

Name: Karenina: Ember
BtnContent: What about a hug?
Contents[1]: You should expect to see me today when you gave me that.
Contents[2]: So what's with this stupid outfit? You look miserably clueless!
Contents[3]: Whatever, just give me your hand. Don't you know how to hold hands?
Contents[4]: Wait a sec, don't grab me all of a sudden! Don't use so much force, you fool!

Name: Nanami: Pulse
BtnContent: Thanks... Wait, what?
Contents[1]: I'm back! It's a me! Na☆na☆mi!
Contents[2]: Why didn't you tell Nanami earlier!? Do you know how difficult it is to take this out?
Contents[3]: I had to return to the lab within 15 sec, smash—I mean open the liquid nitrogen container, and rush back here!
Contents[4]: Let me think... You shall have a one-day date with Nanami as punishment!

Name: α
BtnContent: That's a bit difficult...
Contents[1]: Are you waiting for me...? Doesn't seem so. Fine.
Contents[2]: I never thought you would care about such a date in Babylonia.
Contents[3]: Honestly, that gift of yours wasn't very useful. In other words, I didn't like it.
Contents[4]: If you are ever going to give me something again... Just pack yourself up and come to the Ascendant's base.

Name: Watanabe: Astral
BtnContent: I want to see you too.
Contents[1]: Commandant, it's been a while. How have you been?
Contents[2]: I found a rose in an abandoned stronghold while patrolling. I didn't know why, but you were the first thing that came to my M.I.N.D... So I brought it back in the hope that you would like it.
Contents[3]: Then I saw your gift. You were thinking exactly what I was thinking, weren't you?
Contents[4]: I have put your rose in a vase. Hope I can see you before it withers, if possible.

Name: Ayla: Brilliance
BtnContent: I'm ready!
Contents[1]: Happy May 20th, Commandant! I didn't expect to get a gift from you.
Contents[2]: Ah... What I mean is, I'm actually very happy.
Contents[3]: Because it was the first time that I got such a valuable gift. Well, Commandant, are you ready for my "real gift"?

Name: Bianca: Veritas
BtnContent: Yeah, be there soon.
Contents[1]: Thanks for your gift, Commandant.
Contents[2]: By the way, "520 Days With You" just hit the theaters today. Let's watch it together.
Contents[3]: And... There's something I want to tell you too.

Name: Sophia: Silverfang
BtnContent: Thank you, Sophia.
Contents[1]: So this is true...
Contents[2]: This is for you.
Contents[3]: I heard today was a day to exchange gifts with important ones.
Contents[4]: I spent a lot of time preparing this.

Name: Chrome: Arclight
BtnContent: Come to me.
Contents[1]: Incoming communication from Strike Hawk—Chrome's dedicated channel.
Contents[2]: Commandant of Gray Raven, please, allow me to call you by your name this time.
Contents[3]: KURONAME, I have received your gift. I don't know if I have understood this correctly...
Contents[4]: Speaking of roses, I wonder if you have ever heard of "Unter der Rose"—
Contents[5]: I know this may not be allowed, but I want to be there with you.

Name: New Year Gift 1
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: Is this for... me? Thank you, Commandant.
Contents[2]: In this new year, the Gray Raven squad and I will continue to fight alongside you.
Contents[3]: Happy New Year, Commandant.

Name: New Year Gift 2
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: Is this for... me? Thank you, Commandant.
Contents[2]: In this new year, the Gray Raven squad and I will continue to fight alongside you.
Contents[3]: Happy New Year, Commandant.

Name: New Year Gift 3
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: ...Presents? You think this sort of tomfoolery would work on me?
Contents[2]: But since it's you, I guess I'll accept it. Just for now.
Contents[3]: Next time, get something more memorable.

Name: New Year Gift 4
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: Is this a... present? May I really?
Contents[2]: Commandant, you're always so kind...
Contents[3]: Thank you, Commandant. And, Happy New Year!

Name: New Year Gift 5
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: Is this a... present? May I really?
Contents[2]: Commandant, you're always so kind...
Contents[3]: Thank you, Commandant. And, Happy New Year!

Name: New Year Gift 6
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: Is this a... present? May I really?
Contents[2]: Commandant, you're always so kind...
Contents[3]: Thank you, Commandant. And, Happy New Year!

Name: New Year Gift 7
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: Ah, Commandant. Here you are. The data report I sent you 1 hour and 36 minutes 07 seconds ago is still unread. If it's because the function for analysis is...
Contents[2]: What? A New Year present...? For me?
Contents[3]: I, ahem, well, thanks. Happy New Year, Commandant.

Name: New Year Gift 8
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: Ah, Commandant. Here you are. The data report I sent you 1 hour and 36 minutes 07 seconds ago is still unread. If it's because the function for analysis is...
Contents[2]: What? A New Year present...? For me?
Contents[3]: I, ahem, well, thanks. Happy New Year, Commandant.

Name: New Year Gift 9
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: Ooh! That's my pal! You got me a present!
Contents[2]: Oh, it's a New Year present!
Contents[3]: Thanks! I wish you a Happy New Year too!

Name: New Year Gift 10
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: Ooh! That's my pal! You got me a present!
Contents[2]: Oh, it's a New Year present!
Contents[3]: Thanks! I wish you a Happy New Year too!

Name: New Year Gift 11
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: Oh, oh! Nanami's got a New Year present too? Yay!
Contents[2]: I remember in the files that, people back in the Golden Age would greet each other around this time, right?
Contents[3]: So... Nanami shall revive this tradition! Commandant! Happy New Year!

Name: New Year Gift 12
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: Oh, oh! Nanami's got a New Year present too? Yay!
Contents[2]: I remember in the files that, people back in the Golden Age would greet each other around this time, right?
Contents[3]: So... Nanami shall revive this tradition! Commandant! Happy New Year!

Name: New Year Gift 13
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: A New Year present for me?
Contents[2]: Thank you, Commandant of Gray Raven.
Contents[3]: Happy New Year.

Name: New Year Gift 14
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: A present? Pfft, I'm not a kid, I don't want it.
Contents[2]: A-alright, fine... But only because you're insisting so annoyingly.
Contents[3]: (H-Happy New Year...) Nothing! Hmph!

Name: New Year Gift 15
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: A present? Pfft, I'm not a kid, I don't want it.
Contents[2]: A-alright, fine... But only because you're insisting so annoyingly.
Contents[3]: (H-Happy New Year...) Nothing! Hmph!

Name: New Year Gift 16
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents[1]: A New Year present? All the trouble just for me...?
Contents[2]: Oh, well. Guess I better co-operate then.
Contents[3]: Happy New Year.
